text: La meilleure façon de prédire l'avenir est de l'inventer.
author: Alan Kay

text: Petit à petit, l'oiseau fait son nid.
author: Proverbe

text: L'épargne d'aujourd'hui est la liberté de demain.
author: Anonyme

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Do not save what is left after spending; spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain
